title: OOPS!!    I installed a 820-00165 SMC onto a 820-3437-B logic board !!!!!!!
message:
AND IT WORKD PERFECTLY!!  

Just thought I would share that info with all of you

title: OOPS!!    I installed a 820-00165 SMC onto a 820-3437-B logic board !!!!!!!
message: It works, but do not discard future weird behaviors...

title: OOPS!!    I installed a 820-00165 SMC onto a 820-3437-B logic board !!!!!!!
OOPS!!    I installed a 820-00165 SMC onto a 820-3437-B logic board !!!!!!!
message: It was a total accident.   I have dozens of SMC's reballed and ready for use but wasn't paying attention when I grabbed the wrong one.

title: OOPS!!    I installed a 820-00165 SMC onto a 820-3437-B logic board !!!!!!!
message:
>>>>>>  UPDATE  <<<<<<<

Charging did not work.   Had to change the SMC again!
